channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Industrial Edge Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Industrial Edge Management

item.title: CVE-2022-40147|2024-08-03T12:14:39.697Z -- siemens -- industrial%20edge%20management
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Industrial Edge Management (All versions < V1.5.1). The affected software does not properly validate the server certificate when initiating a TLS connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between the client and the intended server.
